EndDate.description: The date from which the channel is eligible for the promotion.

EngagementChannelTypeId.description: ID of the engagement channel type that the channel belongs to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion for which the channel is eligible.

RetailLocationGroupId.description: ID of the retail location group that’s eligible for the promotion.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the retail store that’s eligible for the promotion.

StartDate.description: Required. The date till which the channel is eligible for the promotion.
